title: The Google walkout, one year later
description:
A year ago, a reported 20,000 Google employees walked off the job in protest. Has employee activism changed one of the biggest companies in tech?

Links to resources discussed:
Google CEO, in leaked video, says company is ‘genuinely struggling’ with employee trust
Three Years of Misery Inside Google, the Happiest Company in Tech
Google walkout organizer quits company after alleged retaliation
Google’s attempt to shut down a unionization meeting just riled up its employees


Featuring:
@shiringhaffary
@lizthegrey

Hosts:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:
Newsletter: Recode Daily 
Twitter: @Recode
